text: Robert Bruce Johnson (August 18, 1875 – October 16, 1932) was a Republican member of the Wisconsin Senate, representing the 25th District from 1927 to 1931. He resided in Superior, Wisconsin.Wisconsin Blue Book, 1991-92 edition, (Statistics: History) page 660. ==References== Category:Wisconsin state senators Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:1875 births Category:1932 deaths
title: Bruce Johnson (Wisconsin politician)
